name: born_of_the_gods
description: Mechanics and themes from Magic: The Gathering — Born of the Gods (Theros block). Includes Heroic, Inspired, Tribute, Bestow Auras, Devotion (Gods), Scry, and Theros-flavored archetypes.

Creature: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, {HEROIC_W}
Inspired — Whenever this creature becomes untapped, {INSPIRED_W}

Tribute {TRIBUTE_NUMBER} (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent may put {TRIBUTE_NUMBER} +1/+1 counters on it.)
When this creature enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, {TRIBUTE_PUNISH_W}
This creature gets +1/+1 as long as your devotion to {DEVOTION_COLOR_WORD_W} is five or more.
When this creature enters the battlefield, {POSTSCRY}
When this creature enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura card from your graveyard to your hand.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Tap this creature. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
As long as this creature is enchanted, it gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.
Instant: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {POSTSCRY}
Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
Enchantment:
Creatures you control have first strike.
Creatures your opponents control lose first strike and can't have or gain first strike.
As long as your devotion to {DEVOTION_COLOR_WORD_W} is five or more, creatures you control get +1/+1.

Indestructible
As long as your devotion to {DEVOTION_COLOR_WORD_W} is less than five, {CARDNAME} isn't a creature.
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
AuraCreature:
Bestow {BESTOW_COST}
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets {AURA_PUMP} and has {AURA_ABILITY_W}.
As long as this Aura isn't attached to a creature, it's a creature in addition to its other types.
Activated: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Target creature you control gains "Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, scry 1" until end of turn.
Land:
Temple — This land enters the battlefield tapped.
When this land enters the battlefield, scry 1.

At the beginning of combat on your turn,
HEROIC_W: put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
tap target creature an opponent controls.
this creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
HEROIC_U: this creature can't be blocked this turn.
draw a card, then discard a card.
HEROIC_B: each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
HEROIC_R: this creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
it deals 1 damage to any target.
HEROIC_G: put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
this creature gains trample until end of turn.
INSPIRED_W: tap up to one target creature.
INSPIRED_B: each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
INSPIRED_R: this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
INSPIRED_G: put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
TRIBUTE_PUNISH_W: exile target tapped creature an opponent controls until this creature leaves the battlefield.
TRIBUTE_PUNISH_U: tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
TRIBUTE_PUNISH_R: this creature deals 3 damage to any target.
TRIBUTE_PUNISH_G: destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
